name: WP Social Broadcast
author: Navnish Bhardwaj

sections.description:
This plugin will provide your site with unique possibility to viral spreading the news you provde on social networks such as Twitter, Facebook, Linkedin, Google, Yahoo, Hotmail and more.

Currently Supported Providers

Gmail, Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Yahoo, Live, Foursquare.

Features

  • Different API limits
  • Sidebar widget for sidebars
  • HTML emails
  • Predefined invitation messages
  • Custom CSS

Premium version

  • Unlimited usage not limited for 30 days as in Free version
  • GMAIL SUPPORT
  • Redirect users after they send broadcast
  • Free Support
sections.installation:
1. In your WordPress dashboard, go to menu Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for WP Social Broadcast or upload WP Social Broadcast zip file
  3. Click to install
  4. Activate the plugin
  5. A new menu WP Social Broadcast will appear in your Admin
  6. Enjoy the plugin
sections.changelog:
2.0.0 – Sept, 2016

Code Updated to support latest version of WordPress and to support latest Twitter and Facebook APIs.

1.8.0 – May, 2015

More social media platforms supported.

1.5.0 – Dec, 2014

Bugs fixed in compatibility with latest WordPress version.

1.0.0 – April, 2014

  • Plugin released, by Karl Lillrud in contribution with Navnish Bhardwaj (http://www.navnishbhardwaj.com)
